Module Breakout.Clone
Package Objects

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
Objects.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
Class to create the wall of bricks that will need to be destroyed in each level

    • makeLevels

      public Brick[][] makeLevels(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      Creates and returns a 2-dimensional array with each level of the game and the bricks to draw in that level
      Parameters:
      drawArea - The area of the board for the game to be played on
      brickCount - The number of bricks to draw
      lineCount - The number of lines of bricks to draw
      brickDimensionRatio - The ratio of the height of a brick to its width
      Returns:
      a 2-dimensional array with each level of the game and the bricks to draw in that level
